pr_title: Allow to specify a callback that is executed once submit was called and

timeline.message:
Allow to specify a callback that is executed once submit was called and
use it for clearing the IovArrays

Motivation:

IOUringSubmissionQueue may call submit() internally when there is no
space left in the buffer. Once this is done we can reuse for example
IovArrays etc. Because of this its useful to be able to specify a
callback that is executed after submission

Modifications:

- Allow to specify a Runnable that is called once submission was
complete
- Use this callback to clear the IovArrays

Result:

IovArrays are automatically cleared on each submit call.

timeline.bodyText: I increasingly want the IovArray[8] to be encapsulated in its own component, which we could then ask for a clear-callback. Then we could also test it independently.
timeline.author: chrisvest

replies.bodyText: I can do this... But lets do this as a followup..
replies.author: normanmaurer

timeline.bodyText: Could we perhaps wire this up after construction, so we don't need to pass the callback through so many layers?
timeline.author: chrisvest

replies.bodyText: @chrisvest I would like to keep it as it is ... wiring up things after construction is more error-prone and this one is easy to pass through.
